=========================
Mediacore mediainfo
=========================

Mediacore.mediainfo provides info about media files as JSON.
This information are used by redturtle.video in order to publish contents via Plone CMS.

Follow this link for more information about
`RedTurtle video <http://plone.org/products/redturtle.video>`_.


USAGE
-----

link to the JSON file:

http://domain/mediainfo/media_unique_id?slug=id_file
